name: Paradox
description: In response to an allied creature within a very short (5 unit) distance being attacked but before the attack roll, you warp reality and choose another ally within a very short (5 unit) distance to take their place, swapping their positions. If you do not roll at least 2 successes on your spell check, you swap with the attacked ally instead, taking their place and becoming the target of the attack. Your defense check against this attack is halved.
charge: The range increases to short (10 units) for both the attacked ally and the ally you swap them with.
